# docker-protobuf

Original repo: https://github.com/TheThingsIndustries/docker-protobuf

## Supported languages

- C
- C#
- C++
- Dart
- Go
- Java / JavaNano (Android)
- JavaScript
- Objective-C
- PHP
- Python
- Ruby
- Rust
- Swift
- Typescript

## Usage

```bash
$ docker run --rm -v<some-path>:<some-path> -w<some-path> thethingsindustries/protoc [OPTION] PROTO_FILES
```
